<h1 align="center">
  Presidential Shopping Spree
</h1>

Isang mumunting website na nagpapakita kung ano ang mararating ng 8.2 billion-peso budget ng Office of the President.

## Getting started

### Prerequisites

- Node 11.6 (via nvm)
- Yarn 1.17

### Running the project

- After cloning the project, use the correct Node and install packages by running:
  ```
  nvm use 11.6
  yarn
  ```
- Once done, run `gatsby develop` or `yarn develop` and go to `localhost:8000`

## Deployment

See deployed site here: [https://2020-budget.netlify.com](https://2020-budget.netlify.com)

## Built with

- [Gatsby](http://gatsbyjs.org/)
- [Bulma](https://bulma.io/)

## Contributing

Please read [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/cayeborreo/2020-budget/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) for details on our code of conduct, and the process for submitting pull requests to us.
